name: The Minimalist Tote
description: Crafted from vegan leather, this tote combines sleek design with everyday functionality. Its spacious interior and minimalist aesthetic make it a versatile accessory for any occasion, from the office to a weekend getaway.

details.fit: Dimensions: 15" W x 12" H x 5" D
details.care: Wipe clean with a damp cloth.

name: Relaxed Fit Blue Jeans
description: Effortlessly cool and endlessly versatile, these relaxed fit blue jeans are a wardrobe essential. Made from high-quality denim, they offer both comfort and style for any casual occasion.

details.fit: Relaxed fit with a straight leg. Model is 6'1" and wearing a size 32.
details.care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.

name: Organic Cotton Tee
description: A wardrobe staple, redefined. Made from 100% GOTS-certified organic cotton, this t-shirt offers unparalleled softness and breathability. Its classic cut and durable fabric ensure it will be a favorite for years to come.

details.fit: Classic crewneck fit. True to size.
details.care: Machine wash warm with like colors. Tumble dry medium.

name: Classic Beige Blazer
description: A timeless beige blazer that adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit. Versatile and elegant, it's a must-have for your wardrobe.

name: Elegant Black Dress
description: A sophisticated and versatile black dress, perfect for any occasion. Its classic silhouette and comfortable fabric make it an essential piece for a polished look.

details.fit: A-line silhouette, hits just above the knee.
details.care: Machine wash cold, hang to dry.

name: Classic White Blouse
description: A versatile and timeless white blouse. Perfect for both casual and formal looks, offering a crisp and clean style that pairs effortlessly with any wardrobe.

details.fit: Slightly oversized fit with buttoned cuffs.
details.care: Machine wash warm, iron on medium heat.

name: Cozy Knit Cardigan
description: Stay warm and stylish with this cozy knit cardigan. Perfect for layering over your favorite outfits, it offers both comfort and a chic, relaxed look.

details.care: Hand wash cold, lay flat to dry.

name: Chunky Knit Sweater
description: Embrace cozy sophistication with this chunky knit sweater. Made from a blend of merino wool and alpaca, it's exceptionally warm and soft. The relaxed fit and ribbed detailing add a touch of effortless style.

name: The City Slicker Handbag
description: A chic and structured handbag designed for the modern professional. With its clean lines and polished hardware, it's the perfect companion for navigating the city in style.

details.fit: Dimensions: 13" W x 10" H x 6" D. Includes detachable shoulder strap.
details.care: Protect from rain. Use leather conditioner periodically.

name: Tailored Black Trousers
description: Cut for a flattering slim fit, these black trousers are a versatile foundation for any outfit. Dress them up with a blazer for the office or down with a simple tee for a relaxed weekend look.

details.fit: Slim fit, high-waisted design with a front crease.
details.care: Machine washable, do not tumble dry.

name: Plaid Flannel Shirt
description: A classic plaid flannel shirt, perfect for a layered look. Its soft fabric and timeless pattern make it a versatile piece for any casual wardrobe.

details.fit: Regular fit. Can be worn as a shirt or light jacket.
details.care: Machine wash cold with like colors. Tumble dry low.

name: Ivory Turtleneck Sweater
description: A classic ivory turtleneck sweater, perfect for a cozy and chic look. Made from a soft knit fabric, it's a versatile piece for your winter wardrobe.

details.care: Hand wash cold or dry clean.

name: Stylish V-Neck Sweater
description: A classic V-neck sweater that combines comfort and style. Its versatile design makes it a perfect addition to any wardrobe, easily paired with jeans or trousers.

details.fit: Classic fit. Ribbed hem and cuffs.

name: Classic Trench Coat
description: A timeless trench coat that adds a layer of sophistication to any outfit. Its classic design and neutral color make it a versatile wardrobe staple.

details.fit: Double-breasted with a waist belt for a customizable fit.

name: Casual Zip-Up Hoodie
description: A versatile zip-up hoodie perfect for layering. Its relaxed fit and soft fabric provide all-day comfort, making it an essential for casual outings or lounging at home.

details.fit: Relaxed fit with a drawstring hood.
details.care: Machine wash warm, tumble dry low.

name: Essential Grey Hoodie
description: A classic grey hoodie that offers both comfort and style. Made from soft, high-quality fabric, it's perfect for everyday wear.
